concept.title: Creating and Unlinking a File Descriptor from a Shared Memory

conbody.p: The shm_open() function enables you to create shared memory and associate a file descriptor. Use the shm_unlink() function to remove (unlink a file descriptor from a shared memory) the name of the shared memory object.
